name: @writerite/wright-node
description: node implementation of WriteRite wright (i.e. bot)
author: Johannes Choo

scripts.build: npm run codegen && npm run download-schema && tsc
scripts.codegen: npm run copymodels && apollo client:codegen -v "$CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG" --useReadOnlyTypes --globalTypesFile=src/gqlGlobalTypes.ts --passthroughCustomScalars --customScalarsPrefix GraphQL --target=typescript gqlTypes && rmdir gqlTypes
scripts.codegen:dev: npm run copymodels && apollo client:codegen -v "$(git branch --show-current)" --useReadOnlyTypes --globalTypesFile=src/gqlGlobalTypes.ts --passthroughCustomScalars --customScalarsPrefix GraphQL --target=typescript gqlTypes && rmdir gqlTypes
scripts.download-schema:dev: apollo client:download-schema -v "$(git branch --show-current)" schema.json && node generatePossibleTypes.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run codegen && npm run download-schema && tsc && node dist/index.js
